title: Collapsibles Setup - Installation
content:
<InstallationCode name="collapsibles" />
To create a new collapsible, wrap any section of your app with a <Collapsible> component. This does not render anything to the DOM and provides context for the other components to work together. Then render a <CollapsibleContent> component anywhere within this to have its height animated from 0 to auto on toggle. The easiest way to toggle a collapsible is with the <CollapsibleToggler> component.
Pro tip: set the openOnInit prop to have the collapsible open on first render.
